headline: Figma: Decelerating Growth Meets Expensive Valuations, Minimal Margin Of Safety
summary: FIG trades at premium valuations with strong margins and an AI-driven platform, but slowing growth and insider selling raise risks. Find out why FIG stock is a hold.
